columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: LastEditedTime
columns.description: Date and time when the message was last edited

columns.name: TeamsMessageId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the message, as generated by Microsoft 365

columns.name: SenderDisplayName
columns.description: Name of the sender displayed in the address book

columns.name: SenderObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the senderâ€™s account

columns.name: SenderType
columns.description: Type of user that sent the message (User, Group, Anonymous)

columns.name: RecipientDetails
columns.description: Array of recipient data (RecipientSmtpAddress, RecipientDisplayName, RecipientType, RecipientObjectId)

columns.name: IsOwnedThread
columns.description: Whether the message is owned by your organization
